_source.short_desc: Google Contacts is an online address book which allows users to manage, store, sync and organize contacts across all devices.
_source.long_desc: Google Contacts is an online address book which allows users to manage, store, sync and organize contacts across all devices.

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Transfer contacts between multiple data sources

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

category_features.name: Sales Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Pipeline view and tracking lead status

category_features.name: Search/Filter
category_features.definition: Search and/or filter for items using names, keywords, descriptions, tags, metadata, etc.

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Shared Contacts
category_features.definition: Share contacts with other applications like Gmail and CRM

related_products.short_desc: Spend less time digging through spreadsheets and more time selling.
related_products.features: Organize contacts, schedule tasks, and manage deals more efficiently with Salesforce contact management software. Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Managing contacts and sales communications has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile contact management software.
related_products.features: Managing contacts and sales communications has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile contact management software. Focus on the activities that transform leads into customers while enjoying Pipedrives intuitive and simple design. In addition to being integrable with hundreds of supporting client management apps and integrations, our robust mobile CRM keeps you close to contacts and full feature access on the go.

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable combines an intuitive spreadsheet interface with file attachments, kanban boards, calendars, and other powerful features.
related_products.features: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Act! Premium empowers you to market better, sell more, and create customers for life.
related_products.features: Act! Premium, a powerful CRM and Marketing Automation tool in one platform, is perfect for small and midsize businesses looking to market better, sell more, and create customers for life. With unparalleled flexibility and freedom of choice, Act! Premium accommodates the unique ways you do business, whether it's on-premises (Act! Premium Desktop), in the cloud (Act! Premium Cloud), or, you can leverage a hybrid deployment for maximum flexibility!

related_products.short_desc: Copper is the easy-to-use CRM that's designed for and recommended by Google. Want to be more organized and productive? Try it now.
related_products.features: Copper is the easy-to-use CRM for businesses on Google Workspace looking to manage more sales leads & grow customer relationships but don't have time for data entry, repetitive admin tasks, or complicated tools. Copper integrates with Gmail and other Google Apps, so it logs all your emails and other interactions to the right contact for you. You can also see your sales and relationship essentials from email threads, to past interactions, to tasks... all in one place.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free contact management and CRM software with 8 million clients worldwide. Cloud, mobile and open source versions available
related_products.features: If you are looking for free online contact management software that doesn't limit how many contacts you can have, comes with email marketing, fully featured CRM and contact manager ? Bitrix24 is it! Bitrix24 is extremely easy to use and comes jam packed with advanced sales tools.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage contacts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
Contact management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to manage contacts, book clients, streamline projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use, affordable, small business contact manager to track contacts, schedule follow-ups, and manage workflows.
related_products.features:
Less Annoying CRM is a simple contact manager built from the ground up for small businesses. Manage your contacts, leads, notes, calendar, to-do's and more, all from one simple web app. Our product is founded on three core principles: simplicity, affordability, and outstanding customer service. 

All users get an unlimited free 30-day trial, and customer service is always free through the phone and email.

similar_products.short_desc: Spend less time digging through spreadsheets and more time selling.
similar_products.features: Organize contacts, schedule tasks, and manage deals more efficiently with Salesforce contact management software. Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.

similar_products.short_desc: The only choice for comprehensive sales enablement.
similar_products.features: SalesRabbit's game-changing methodology is based on research they've done with sales pros and the top teams in the industry. It targets the main traction points of every successful organization: rep motivation, team efficiency, and sales mastery. The app is built to help your company make changes that enable peak performance at every door. Their dedicated CSMs and support staff work with you to implement these strategies, ensuring you get the results every door-to-door company hopes for.

similar_products.short_desc: Bigin helps small businesses move away from spreadsheets and get started with a CRM solution that is truly built for their needs.
similar_products.features:
With Bigin, store, organize, and track information about your customers, prospects and sales leads, ultimately leading to better and improved customer relationships.

We built a dedicated CRM for small businesses to help organize sales and track leads easily. With the sheer motive to be simple, Bigin is packed with just the right features, with a user-friendly interface, at a pocket friendly price to fit your small business like a glove!

similar_products.short_desc: Outreach is the only solution to integrate sales engagement, conversation intelligence, and revenue intelligence into one platform.
similar_products.features: Do you have inbound leads slipping through the cracks? With Outreach Engage, leads are appropriately routed to reps and entered into personalized sequences that utilize proven playbooks & messaging. Help your reps more easily engage with potential buyers by orchestrating all key sales activities like email, phone calls, and social media touches.

similar_products.short_desc: Managing contacts and sales communications has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile contact management software.
similar_products.features: Managing contacts and sales communications has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile contact management software. Focus on the activities that transform leads into customers while enjoying Pipedrives intuitive and simple design. In addition to being integrable with hundreds of supporting client management apps and integrations, our robust mobile CRM keeps you close to contacts and full feature access on the go.

similar_products.short_desc: SalesIntel helps you accelerate lead conversions, maximize outreach, and build a stronger pipeline with human-verified contact data.
similar_products.features:
We're the B2B intelligence platform that gives marketing and sales teams the tools they need to exceed inbound goals and fill their pipeline. 

We provide B2B intelligence using patented AI technology and we stand apart by having the largest database of mobile and direct-dial phone numbers, an industry-leading 95% accuracy rate, and on-demand research to find customized data that their customers need. 

The end result is more reliable, actionable data to reach decision-makers in less time.

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM is the best contact management software to help you track, store, and manage all of your contact information.
similar_products.features: monday sales CRM is the best contact management software to help you store, track, and manage all of your contacts' and accounts' information! Connect your Gmail or Outlook to send/receive emails and keep track of client communication, all in one place. Get an overview of a contact and everything related to it in an easy-to-view snapshot. Assign items, automate emails, set reminders, share files and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
similar_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use, affordable, small business contact manager to track contacts, schedule follow-ups, and manage workflows.
similar_products.features:
Less Annoying CRM is a simple contact manager built from the ground up for small businesses. Manage your contacts, leads, notes, calendar, to-do's and more, all from one simple web app. Our product is founded on three core principles: simplicity, affordability, and outstanding customer service. 

All users get an unlimited free 30-day trial, and customer service is always free through the phone and email.

similar_products.short_desc: Contact Boss is an easy-to-use, powerful CRM database manager that lets you track and manage the people who drive your organization.
similar_products.features:
Contact Boss is an easy-to-use, yet powerful CRM database manager allowing you to track and manage the people who drive your organization.

Contact Boss makes it simple to:
 Enter new or import existing contacts
 Search and organize your contacts
 Keep in touch with your contacts

Contact Boss puts you in charge with robust search capacity, comprehensive reports, superior auditing functions, and security tools to keep your business running smoothly.

similar_products.short_desc: Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and clients in one centralized online hub, and have it all handy, wherever you are.
similar_products.features: Gain and retain clients with a powerful CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and clients in one centralized online hub, get a birds-eye view of your clients' history, appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations and Easily collaborate with your team, assigning clients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app.

similar_products.short_desc: Find and track every customer, contact and communication instantly, then set tasks to follow up, and share with your team.
similar_products.features: Our versatile CRM contact management software makes it easy to manage your contacts and share information across your team. Providing a 360 degree view of all your interactions, you will increase your engagement levels and customer experience for long-lasting relationships and a united team. You are not just keeping track of names and addresses, our CRM records every interaction, including your emails, calls, notes and documents, arranged in a summary timeline so everything is easy to find.

Everything you need to manage contacts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.

Contact management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Communication Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Communication Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Communication Management software streamlines, automates, and tracks customer outreach efforts of an organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
